faqs.question: How is SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud different from Private Cloud?
faqs.answer: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud is a multi-tenant SaaS solution managed by SAP with quarterly updates and pre-configured best practices. Private Cloud offers more customization but requires additional maintenance. Public Cloud provides faster implementation, lower TCO, and automatic updates while maintaining enterprise-grade security and compliance.

faqs.question: What is your implementation methodology?
faqs.answer: We use SAP Activate methodology combined with our proven Fit-to-Standard approach. This includes Discovery & Planning (2 weeks), Fit-to-Standard workshops (4-6 weeks), Configuration & Testing (6-8 weeks), and Go-Live support (2 weeks). Our methodology has delivered 100+ successful implementations with 50% faster deployment than traditional approaches.

faqs.question: Do you provide post-go-live support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive 24/7 post-go-live support including hypercare, ongoing optimization, quarterly update assistance, and continuous improvement initiatives. Our 95% client retention rate reflects our commitment to long-term partnership and success.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with Salesforce and Concur?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in API integrations with major enterprise systems including Salesforce CRM, Concur expense management, Worldpay payment processing, and other third-party applications. Our integration expertise ensures seamless data flow and process automation across your entire technology stack.

faqs.question: What industries do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: We serve 30+ industries with deep expertise in Manufacturing, Retail, Professional Services, Healthcare, Technology, and Public Sector. Our industry-specific accelerators and pre-configured solutions enable faster implementation while addressing unique regulatory and operational requirements.

faqs.question: How long does a typical project take?
faqs.answer: Implementation timeline varies by scope: Standard finance implementation (3-4 months), Complex multi-entity deployments (6-8 months), API integration projects (2-3 months). Our Fit-to-Standard approach and proven methodology consistently deliver 50% faster implementation compared to traditional consulting firms.

faqs.question: What's included in Fit-to-Standard workshops?
faqs.answer: Our Fit-to-Standard workshops cover complete business process mapping, SAP best practice configuration, gap analysis, data migration planning, integration requirements, testing scenarios, and change management strategy. These interactive sessions ensure your team understands the solution and accelerate user adoption.

faqs.question: Do you handle IFRS 15 and ASC 606 compliance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we're experts in Event-Based Revenue Recognition (EBRR) for IFRS 15 and ASC 606 compliance. Our team has implemented revenue recognition solutions across various industries including software, manufacturing, professional services, and retail with complex revenue streams.

faqs.question: What makes ExpTek different from Big 4 consulting firms?
faqs.answer: ExpTek offers focused SAP Public Cloud Finance expertise, 50% faster implementation, 40% cost savings, and dedicated specialist teams rather than generalist consultants. Our lean structure enables faster decision-making, personalized attention, and deep technical expertise that large firms often lack.

faqs.question: Can you help with digital transformation beyond finance?
faqs.answer: While our core expertise is SAP Public Cloud Finance, we collaborate with your existing teams on broader digital transformation initiatives. Our API integration capabilities enable connection with HR, procurement, and operational systems to create unified digital experiences.
